description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the primary widget tree, home page, and basic UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget serving as the home page with a dynamic title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, displaying a loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
